description.description: A brief description of the page's content.

date.description: The date the page was created or last updated.

keywords.description: Keywords related to the page's content.

category.description: The category the page belongs to.

target_audience.description: The intended audience for the page.

registration_steps.description: A list of steps involved in the online seller registration process.

required.description: Indicates if this field is mandatory.
